title: Chlorophyll-a 3 orders of magnitude too high
description:
All IPSL Chlorophyll-a data are 3 orders of magnitude (1e3) too high because related variables are in g/m3 instead of kg/m3 as expected in CMIP6 data request.
Users are invited to apply a factor of 10^-3 while a new version of the affected dataset is published.
Old dataset version will be unpublished from the ESGF.
